comment: WONDERFUL PROFESSOR!!! WOULD DEFNITELY TAKE HER AGAIN IF SHE WAS TEACHING ANOTHER CLASS. STUDY THE CASES AND YOU WILL DO GREAT IN HER CLASS.

She's alright. Very easy class. Is a prosecutor uses it to make her seem she knows everything but not really smart when a student says something and she re-words the same thing to make the student look like they don't know what they're talking about. Really boring overall.

Ms. Murphree is a prosecutor and knows her stuff; very sharp lady. She has real world knowledge on courtroom and criminal procedure. The class is worth the drive to Paulding; we always finished up early. Very easy class; you?ll have no problem pulling an A. The lecture is provided a couple days in advance. I wish she taught other CJ classes.
